item.title: 预算前景明朗，南非债券拍卖需求飙升
item.description: 南非政府债券拍卖吸引了近三个月来最强劲的需求，因为投资者押注该国不断改善的前景和较低的通胀目标将提高固定收益证券的回报率。【原文：An auction of South African government bonds attracted the strongest demand in almost three months as investors bet the country’s improving outlook and a lower inflation target will boost returns on fixed-income securities.】

item.title: 大众汽车称两万名员工同意提前离职
item.description: 大众汽车公司表示，随着该汽车制造商重组其德国业务以应对汽车需求的不平衡，到本十年末将有约 20,000 名员工自愿离职。【原文：Volkswagen AG said about 20,000 employees will voluntarily leave the company by the end of the decade as the carmaker restructures its German operations to cope with uneven demand for its vehicles.】

item.title: 出口民调显示，韩国总统李明博在大选中明显领先
item.description: 周二投票结束后不久公布的出口民调显示，韩国主要反对党民主党提名人李在明在总统选举中明显领先。【原文：South Korea’s main opposition Democratic Party nominee Lee Jae-myung holds a clear lead in the presidential election, according to an exit poll released soon after the voting ended on Tuesday.】

item.title: 中国的 Manus 展示了人工智能代理的前景：评论
item.description: 欢迎阅读 Tech In Depth，这是我们的每日时事通讯，由彭博社全球记者提供有关科技商业的报道和分析。今天，纽利-珀内尔（Newley Purnell）测试了 Manus 人工智能代理。【原文：Welcome to Tech In Depth, our daily newsletter with reporting and analysis about the business of tech from Bloomberg’s journalists around the world. Today, Newley Purnell tests out the Manus AI agent.】

item.title: 特朗普贸易 "不确定性意味着都柏林写字楼市场的无所作为
item.description: 受到美国总统唐纳德-特朗普关税政策惊吓的企业正在全球许多角落盲目扩张。这种不确定性甚至波及到了欧洲最大的跨国公司中心之一都柏林的办公空间。【原文：Companies spooked by US President Donald Trump’s tariffs are flying blind in many corners of the globe. The uncertainty has even reached the hunt for office space in Dublin, one of Europe’s biggest multinational hubs.】

item.title: 白宫经济预测失踪奇案
item.description: 我是克里斯-安斯蒂，波士顿的经济编辑。今天我们来看看白宫缺失的经济预测。请将反馈和建议发送至 ecodaily@bloomberg.net。如果您还没有注册接收本新闻通讯，请点击这里。【原文：I’m Chris Anstey, an economics editor in Boston. Today we’re looking at the missing White House economic forecasts. Send us feedback and tips to ecodaily@bloomberg.net. And if you aren’t yet signed up to receive this newsletter, you can do so here.】

item.title: 巴西航空公司 Azul 曾批评破产，但未能避免破产
item.description: 即使巴西 Azul SA 航空公司在汇率压力和大流行病的残余影响下苦苦挣扎，其高层管理人员仍坚称，他们将竭尽全力避免申请破产。【原文：Even as the Brazilian airline Azul SA struggled with exchange rate pressures and the lingering effects of the pandemic, top executives insisted they would do whatever they could to avoid filing for bankruptcy.】

item.title: 阿尔巴尼亚新机场为库什纳帮助建设的 "里维埃拉 "增光添彩
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的女婿正计划在阿尔巴尼亚沿海地区为富裕游客打造一个华丽的发展项目，该地区的一个新国际机场将在几周内开通航班。【原文：A new international airport on Albania’s coast is set to start flights within weeks in a region where Donald Trump’s son-in-law is planning a glitzy development for rich tourists.】

item.title: 英伟达在短短两个月内暴涨 45% 表明人工智能狂潮卷土重来
item.description:
投资者押注反弹还有进一步运行的空间。【原文：

Investors are betting that the rally has room to run further.

】

item.title: 新银行股东将投票决定 10 亿欧元首次公开募股的步骤
item.description: 新银行（Novo Banco SA）的股东将于周三举行会议，就这家葡萄牙贷款机构可能进行首次公开募股所需的步骤进行投票，但目前还不会就是否进行股票出售做出最终决定。【原文：Novo Banco SA shareholders will meet on Wednesday to vote on steps needed for a possible initial public offering of the Portuguese lender, although a final decision on whether to carry out a share sale won’t be taken yet.】

item.title: 中国假日消费萎缩，消费者情绪持续低迷
item.description: 端午小长假期间，尽管有更多的人外出旅游，但中国消费者的支出却没有回升，这反映出尽管贸易休战，但受美国关税影响，中国消费者信心不足。【原文：Expenditures by Chinese consumers failed to pick up during the Dragon Boat Festival holiday even though more people hit the road, reflecting subdued consumer confidence in an economy reeling from US tariffs, despite a trade truce.】

item.title: 人工智能需求激增，Facebook 所有者 Meta 将向 Constellation 购买核电
item.description: Constellation Energy Corp. 同意向 Meta Platforms Inc. 出售伊利诺伊州一座运行中核电站的电力，随着人工智能使电力需求激增，这项交易可能会推动在该核电站建造一座新反应堆。【原文：Constellation Energy Corp. agreed to sell power from an operating Illinois nuclear plant to Meta Platforms Inc., a deal that could spur construction of a new reactor at the site as artificial intelligence sends power demand soaring.】

item.title: 贝利表示，如果通胀面临超调风险，英国央行可加快减息步伐
item.description: 英国央行行长安德鲁-贝利（Andrew Bailey）表示，如果官员们发现2%的通胀目标有可能无法实现，就需要放弃谨慎的降息态度，采取更积极的行动。【原文：Bank of England Governor Andrew Bailey said it would need to ditch its cautious approach to cutting interest rates and act more aggressively if officials saw the threat of undershooting their 2% inflation target.】

item.title: 欧佩克提高石油产量，该组织开始大幅增产
item.description: 据彭博社调查显示，欧佩克上个月提高了石油产量，该组织在沙特阿拉伯的推动下开始了一系列加速增产行动。【原文：OPEC raised oil production last month as the group began a series of accelerated increases spurred by Saudi Arabia, according to a Bloomberg survey.】

item.title: 英伟达 1 万亿美元的反弹令交易员准备加码
item.description: 英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp. ）的股价在两个月内反弹了 1 万亿美元，随着对该公司的担忧逐渐被乐观情绪所取代，投资者正押注这一反弹还将继续。【原文：Nvidia Corp. shares have staged a $1 trillion rebound in two months — and investors are betting the rally has further to go as fears about the firm give way to optimism.】

item.title: 南非通过新的消费物价指数目标节省 490 亿美元债务
item.description: 据南非中央银行发布的一份研究文件称，降低南非的通胀目标，同时修订借贷策略，可以为政府节省多达 8700 亿兰特（490 亿美元）的偿债成本。【原文：A lower South African inflation target coupled with a revised borrowing strategy could save the government as much as 870 billion rand ($49 billion) in debt-service costs, according to a research document published by the nation’s central bank.】

item.title: 削减美国援助危及世界上最大的艾滋病治疗项目
item.description:
在南非，由于资金枯竭，为移民、男同性恋者和性工作者等边缘化群体提供服务的诊所纷纷关闭。【原文：

In South Africa, clinics serving marginalized groups—migrants, gay men and sex workers—are shutting down as funds dry up.

】

item.title: 平安保险通过可转债募资 15 亿美元
item.description: 根据彭博新闻社看到的交易条款，中国平安保险（集团）股份有限公司正寻求通过可转换债券融资 118 亿港元（15 亿美元）。【原文：Ping An Insurance (Group) Co. of China Ltd. is seeking to raise HK$11.8 billion ($1.5 billion) in convertible bonds, according to terms of the deal seen by Bloomberg News.】

item.title: 欧盟统计局将终止媒体在欧元指标发布前的访问权限
item.description: 欧盟统计局表示，将从 9 月起停止向媒体提前提供预发布数据。【原文：The European Union’s statistics office said it will end early access to pre-releases to media as of September.】

item.title: 安联首席信息官称特朗普的 "报复性 "税收可能导致美元暴跌 5
item.description: 安联集团（Allianz SE）首席投资官路德维克-苏伯兰（Ludovic Subran）表示，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）大规模财政方案中的一项外国税收条款一旦生效，可能会引发美元暴跌 5%，并使股市大幅下挫。【原文：A foreign tax provision in US President Donald Trump’s massive fiscal package could trigger a 5% plunge in the dollar and send equities reeling if it takes effect, according to Allianz SE’s chief investment officer Ludovic Subran.】

item.title: 中国数据重燃经济刺激希望，新兴市场股市上涨
item.description: 新兴市场股市三天来首次上扬，原因是中国工厂活动的下滑加大了对更多经济刺激措施的押注。【原文：Emerging-market stocks advanced for the first time in three days as a slump in China’s factory activity increased bets on more economic stimulus.】

item.title: 红牛继承人向日内瓦信托公司转让 11 亿美元股权
item.description: 当一位奥地利营销人员和一位泰国商人决定向全世界推出红牛时，他们确定了一个简单的所有权结构：各自拥有该企业 49% 的股份。【原文：When an Austrian marketer and a Thai businessman decided to launch Red Bull to the world, they settled on a simple ownership structure: each would own 49% of the venture.】

item.title: 南非经济因农业和运输业意外扩张
item.description: 由于运输和农业促进了经济增长，帮助抵消了制造业的萎缩，南非经济在今年前三个月的扩张超出了预期。【原文：South Africa’s economy beat expectations to expand in the first three months of the year as transport and farming boosted growth, helping offset a contraction in manufacturing.】

item.title: 华尔街博弈如何从特朗普关税翻转中获利
item.description: 随着贸易忧虑再次涌上美国市场，华尔街的一些人正在研究如何利用 2025 年前五个月与关税有关的疯狂抛售和反弹。【原文：As trade worries bubble up once again in US markets, some on Wall Street are gaming out how to take advantage of the wild tariff-related selloffs and rallies that have defined the first five months of 2025.】

item.title: 马来西亚最大养老基金第一季度收入因波动性而下降
item.description: 马来西亚国家退休基金报告称，由于全球市场波动，今年前三个月的投资收入同比下降了 13%。【原文：Malaysia’s state retirement fund reported a 13% year-on-year drop in investment income for the first three months of the year due to volatility in global markets.】

item.title: 欧洲央行推动银行弥补私人市场风险敞口的不足
item.description: 欧洲中央银行的最高银行监管机构表示，该监管机构正在推动贷款机构解决在如何管理与直接贷款人和收购公司的交易风险方面存在的不足。【原文：The European Central Bank’s top bank supervisor said the watchdog is pushing lenders to address shortcomings in how they manage risks from their dealings with direct lenders and buyout firms.】

item.title: 卡洛斯-斯利姆悄然成为墨西哥石油公司最后的合作伙伴
item.description: 从墨西哥首富到墨西哥最重要的石油大亨，卡洛斯-斯利姆的转变来得缓慢而微妙。卡洛斯-斯利姆在塔洛斯能源公司（Talos Energy Inc.2023 年，卡洛斯-斯利姆以 5.3 亿美元从一位亿万富翁手中买下了两处油田资产。之后又计划斥资 12 亿美元开发墨西哥湾的一个天然气矿床。【原文：The transformation of Mexico’s richest person into its most important oil baron came about slowly, almost subtly. Carlos Slim built up a stake in Talos Energy Inc. before flipping it for the company’s Mexican unit. There was a 2023 deal for $530 million to buy a pair of oilfield assets from a fellow billionaire. Then a $1.2 billion plan to develop a gas deposit in the Gulf of Mexico.】

item.title: 欧元区通胀率放缓至 2% 以下，支持欧洲央行进一步减息
item.description: 欧元区通胀率下降幅度超过预期，低于欧洲央行 2% 的目标，支持了进一步降低利率的理由。【原文：Euro-area inflation eased more than expected, dipping below the European Central Bank’s 2% target and supporting the case for interest rates to be lowered further.】

item.title: 人工智能药物初创公司在治疗肺病方面取得可喜进展
item.description: 一种利用人工智能开发的药物在治疗一种无法治愈的肺部疾病方面显示出了疗效，其开发者称之为 "临床首例"。【原文：A drug developed using artificial intelligence showed signs of efficacy in treating an incurable lung disease in what its developer calls a clinical first.】

item.title: 罗马尼亚将在控制赤字的斗争中赢得欧盟的缓和支持
item.description: 在对这个黑海国家采取可能的惩罚行动之前，欧盟很可能会给罗马尼亚政府一个缓刑期，让其采取措施削减不断膨胀的预算赤字。【原文：The European Union is likely to offer the Romanian government a reprieve to introduce measures aimed at paring its ballooning budget deficit before moving to potential punitive action against the Black Sea nation.】
